content: I hope all these changes are correct... I'm still confused about how to resolve certain conflicts.

Looks okay except for restoring the meta if, which came from an (automatic) bad merge of the lakefile on the nightly-testing branch.

(Because the requires are different on nightly-testing, when there was a conflict with the removing meta if change on master, nightly-testing won by --strategy ours, but this was incorrect in this case.)
Actually one thing we better do, now that lean4#4495 has landed, is to switch all the require statements to use the new reservoir resolution, to begin stress testing that.
(I've pushed this on nightly-testing, it seems fine.)
